name: Jack Mania
description:
You are a little girl, and it's your birthday. As with any child birthday, you play Simon Says. But beware: disobey could kill you.

The prototype was made during the Game, Sun & Jam organized by Game IN. The theme was : "Obey must be a pleasure"

Team : Manon Bertin, Jérôme Bonamy, Maxime Dumon-Dehon, Delphine Verfaillie, Valentin Lai Su Maine, Jérémy Lesage.
